European Union's investigation

competitors including spotify from
informing users about
payment gateways for services other than the app store
Apple has restricted developers from
informing users about
cheaper alternative music services located  Outside of the

night sky. The shimmering display of the aurora borealis
can be seen lighting up the
night sky from the highest peak of Mount Penan s Wells
located in the North York National Park
according to  Scientists say the aurora phenomenon
occurs when charged particles
from the sun rush into the
earth's atmosphere at extremely high speeds. These particles
collide with oxygen and nitrogen atoms in
the atmosphere, causing energy levels to rise.
They rise and emit colorful light.
